# Test the Vim8 package install approach

[short] skip
[!net] skip

env HOME=$WORK/home
env GOPATH=$CURRENT_GOPATH
env GOVIMTEST_SOCKET=
env GOVIMTESTDRIVER_SOCKET=

exec git clone -q $PLUGIN_PATH $HOME/.vim/pack/plugins/start/govim

execvim --not-a-term +'sleep 2' +'execute "normal \"=GOVIMHello()\<C-M>p"' +'w test' +qall
! stdout .+
! stderr .+
cmp test test.golden

-- test.golden --
Hello from function
